content.question: The image shows the Old City of Jerusalem. Which statement best describes the spatial pattern in the cultural landscape?

choices.label: The image shows distinctive cultural areas that represent the five world religions that are practiced in close proximity to one another in the Old City.
The skyscrapers shown in the image represent a secular landscape that indicates how modern Jerusalem has become.
The image shows dispersed residential areas, implying that Jerusalem is very densely populated.
The image shows defensive characteristics of the walled section of the city that remain active today.
The image indicates that Muslim and Jewish citizens live in close proximity to each other.

content.answer: The image indicates that Muslim and Jewish citizens live in close proximity to each other.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Describe the spatial patterns presented in visual sources.
